trans-unit.source: Controls <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> rendering and rafting, and the merging of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Controles de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> renderização rafting e a mesclagem de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu"> </xref>, e <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: ToolStripManager supports <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>-related tasks for entire applications, such as merging, settings, and renderer options.
trans-unit.target: Oferece suporte a ToolStripManager <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>-relacionadas a tarefas para aplicativos inteiros, como opções de mesclagem, configurações e renderizador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The overloaded <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A> method combines <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls with each other, and the overloaded <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.RevertMerge%2A> method undoes a merge operation.
trans-unit.target: Sobrecarregados <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A>método combina <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>controles entre si, e o sobrecarregado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.RevertMerge%2A>método Desfaz uma operação de mesclagem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.RevertMerge%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class with the ToolStripManager class to gain even more control and customizability over painting and layout style.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>classe com a classe ToolStripManager para obter mais controle e personalização sobre estilo de layout e pintura.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>

trans-unit.source: Finds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> or a type derived from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Localiza especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> ou um tipo derivado de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the FindToolStrip method to search for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> or an object derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Use o método FindToolStrip para pesquisar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>ou um objeto derivado de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Derived types of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> are <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Tipos derivados da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>são <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: If the object of the search is not specifically a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> but one of these derived types, cast the return type as required.
trans-unit.target: Se o objeto da pesquisa não é especificamente um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, mas um desses tipos derivados, converter o tipo de retorno conforme necessário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: A string specifying the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> or derived <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> type to find.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres especificando o nome do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> ou derivado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> tipo a ser localizado.

trans-unit.source: The or one of its derived types as specified by the toolStripName parameter, or if the is not found.
trans-unit.target: O ou um de seus tipos derivados conforme especificado pelo toolStripName parâmetro, ou se o não foi encontrado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a value indicating whether the specified shortcut key is used by any of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> controls of a form.
trans-unit.target: Recupera um valor que indica se a tecla de atalho especificada é usada por todos os <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> controles de um formulário.

trans-unit.source: The shortcut key for which to search.
trans-unit.target: A tecla de atalho a ser pesquisado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the shortcut key is used by any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> on the form; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a tecla de atalho é usada por qualquer <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> no formulário; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a value indicating whether a defined shortcut key is valid.
trans-unit.target: Recupera um valor que indica se uma tecla de atalho definida é válida.

trans-unit.source: Valid shortcut keys are the function keys F1 through F12 alone; function keys with CTRL, ALT, or SHIFT modifiers; or other keys with CTRL, ALT, or SHIFT modifiers.
trans-unit.target: Teclas de atalho válidas são as teclas de função F1 por meio de F12 sozinho; teclas de função com modificadores SHIFT, ALT ou CTRL; ou outras chaves com modificadores CTRL, ALT ou SHIFT.

trans-unit.source: CTRL, ALT, or SHIFT keys and keys other than function keys are not valid shortcut keys if used alone.
trans-unit.target: CTRL, ALT, ou teclas SHIFT e chaves que não seja de teclas de função não são as teclas de atalho válido quando usado sozinho.

trans-unit.source: The shortcut key to test for validity.
trans-unit.target: A tecla de atalho para testar a validade.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the shortcut key is valid; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a tecla de atalho é válida. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Loads settings for the given <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> using the full name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> as the settings key.
trans-unit.target: Carrega as configurações para o determinado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> usando o nome completo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> como a chave de configurações.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls that are not on the form at design time when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> settings are saved are removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> when the settings are loaded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>controles que não estão no formulário no design de hora em que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>configurações são salvas são removidos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>quando as configurações são carregadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: To reset the settings, comment out the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A> line and leave the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.SaveSettings%2A> line.
trans-unit.target: Para redefinir as configurações, comente a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A>de linha e deixe o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.SaveSettings%2A>linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.SaveSettings%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A>

trans-unit.source: This will not load any settings and will persist the last state.
trans-unit.target: Isso não carregará as configurações e será mantido o último estado.

trans-unit.source: When you remove the comment from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A> line, those settings will be applied.
trans-unit.target: Quando você remover o comentário do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A>linha, essas configurações serão aplicadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> whose name is also the settings key.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> cujo nome também é a chave de configurações.

trans-unit.source: The targetForm parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The targetForm parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Loads settings for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> using the specified settings key.
trans-unit.target: Carrega configurações especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> usando a chave de configurações especificadas.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls that are not on the form at design time when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> settings are saved are removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> when the settings are loaded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>controles que não estão no formulário no design de hora em que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>configurações são salvas são removidos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>quando as configurações são carregadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: To reset the settings, comment out the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A> line and leave the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.SaveSettings%2A> line.
trans-unit.target: Para redefinir as configurações, comente a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A>de linha e deixe o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.SaveSettings%2A>linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.SaveSettings%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A>

trans-unit.source: This will not load any settings and will persist the last state.
trans-unit.target: Isso não carregará as configurações e será mantido o último estado.

trans-unit.source: When you remove the comment from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A> line, those settings will be applied.
trans-unit.target: Quando você remover o comentário do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A>linha, essas configurações serão aplicadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> for which to load settings.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> para o qual carregar as configurações.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing the settings key for this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que representa a chave de configurações para este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The key parameter is or empty.
trans-unit.target: O key parâmetro é ou vazio.

trans-unit.source: Combines two <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> objects of the same type.
trans-unit.target: Combina duas <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> objetos do mesmo tipo.

trans-unit.source: Use the Merge method to combine <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects of identical type, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects with other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> objects with other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> objects, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Use o método de mesclagem para combinar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>tipo de objetos de idênticos, como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>objetos com outros <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>objetos, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>objetos com outros <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>objetos e assim por diante.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to combine <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects of different types.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método combinar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>objetos de tipos diferentes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property must be set to `true` for both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects, and the source and target types must be identical, or this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade deve ser definida como `true` para ambos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>objetos e os tipos de origem e destino devem ser idênticos ou este método retorna `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If there are two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controls on an MDI child form, setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A> to `true` for the parent form merges the contents of only one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controls.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se houver duas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>controles em um formulário MDI filho, definindo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A>para `true` pai formulário mescla o conteúdo de apenas uma o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>controles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: Use Merge to merge the contents of additional child <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controls on the MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: Use Merge para mesclar o conteúdo de filho adicional <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>controles no formulário pai MDI.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to be combined with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> referred to by the `targetName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> a ser combinado com o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> referenciado pelo `targetName` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> that receives the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> referred to by the `sourceToolStrip` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> que recebe o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> referenciado pelo `sourceToolStrip` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the merge is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a mesclagem for bem-sucedida; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: The sourceToolStrip or targetName parameter is .

trans-unit.target: The sourceToolStrip or targetName parameters refer to the same .

trans-unit.source: Combines two <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> objects of different types.
trans-unit.target: Combina duas <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> objetos de tipos diferentes.

trans-unit.source: Use the Merge method to combine <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects of different types.
trans-unit.target: Use o método de mesclagem para combinar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>objetos de tipos diferentes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to combine <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects of identical type, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects with other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> objects with other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> objects, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método combinar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>tipo de objetos de idênticos, como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>objetos com outros <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>objetos, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>objetos com outros <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>objetos e assim por diante.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property must be set to `true` for both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects, or this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade deve ser definida como `true` para ambos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>objetos ou este método retorna `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If there are two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controls on an MDI child form, setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A> to `true` for the parent form merges the contents of only one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> controls.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se houver duas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>controles em um formulário MDI filho, definindo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A>para `true` pai formulário mescla o conteúdo de apenas uma o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>controles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.IsMdiContainer%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>

trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A>para mesclar o conteúdo de filho adicional <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>controles no formulário pai MDI.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Merge%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default painting styles for the form.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o padrão de estilos de pintura para o formulário.

trans-unit.source: This Renderer property is used when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RenderMode%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderMode>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é usada quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RenderMode%2A>propriedade do atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RenderMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Renderer*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Renderer*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Renderer*>

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > To prevent memory leaks, disable this event when your application is disposed.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Para evitar perdas de memória, desabilite esse evento quando seu aplicativo é descartado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default theme for the form.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tema padrão para o formulário.

trans-unit.source: Use the RenderMode property to get or set whether the application is painted by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>, or a customized <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade RenderMode para obter ou definir se o aplicativo é pintado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> personalizado</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManagerRenderMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManagerRenderMode"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The set value was not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManagerRenderMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor de conjunto não era um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManagerRenderMode"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManagerRenderMode"></xref> is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManagerRenderMode"></xref>; use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Renderer*> property instead.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManagerRenderMode"></xref>é definido como <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManagerRenderMode"> </xref>; use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Renderer*>propriedade em vez disso.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Renderer*>

trans-unit.source: Undoes a merging of two <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> objects, returning the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> with the specified name to its state before the merge and nullifying all previous merge operations.
trans-unit.target: Desfaz uma mesclagem de dois <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> objetos, retornando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> com o nome especificado para seu estado antes da mesclagem e anulará anterior todas as operações de mesclagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property must be set to `true` for both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects, or this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade deve ser definida como `true` para ambos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>objetos ou este método retorna `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> for which to undo a merge operation.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> para os quais desfazer uma operação de mesclagem.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the undoing of the merge is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o desfazer a mesclagem for bem-sucedida; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Undoes a merging of two <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> objects, returning the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to its state before the merge and nullifying all previous merge operations.
trans-unit.target: Desfaz uma mesclagem de dois <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> objetos, retornando especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> para seu estado antes da mesclagem e anulará anterior todas as operações de mesclagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property must be set to `true` for both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects, or this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade deve ser definida como `true` para ambos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>objetos ou este método retorna `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> for which to undo a merge operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> para os quais desfazer uma operação de mesclagem.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the undoing of the merge is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o desfazer a mesclagem for bem-sucedida; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Undoes a merging of two <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> objects, returning both <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> controls to their state before the merge and nullifying all previous merge operations.
trans-unit.target: Desfaz uma mesclagem de dois <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> objetos, retornando ambos <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> controles para seu estado antes da mesclagem e anulará anterior todas as operações de mesclagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property must be set to `true` for both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects, or this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade deve ser definida como `true` para ambos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>objetos ou este método retorna `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowMerge%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> for which to undo a merge operation.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> para os quais desfazer uma operação de mesclagem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> that was merged with the `targetToolStrip`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> que foi mesclada com a `targetToolStrip`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the undoing of the merge is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o desfazer a mesclagem for bem-sucedida; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The sourceToolStrip is .
trans-unit.target: The sourceToolStrip is .

trans-unit.source: Saves settings for the given <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> using the full name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> as the settings key.
trans-unit.target: Salva as configurações para o determinado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> usando o nome completo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> como a chave de configurações.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls that are not on the form at design time when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> settings are saved are removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> when the settings are loaded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>controles que não estão no formulário no design de hora em que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>configurações são salvas são removidos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>quando as configurações são carregadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: To reset the settings, comment out the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A> line and leave the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.SaveSettings%2A> line.
trans-unit.target: Para redefinir as configurações, comente a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A>de linha e deixe o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.SaveSettings%2A>linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.SaveSettings%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A>

trans-unit.source: This will not load any settings and will persist the last state.
trans-unit.target: Isso não carregará as configurações e será mantido o último estado.

trans-unit.source: When you remove the comment from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A> line, those settings will be applied.
trans-unit.target: Quando você remover o comentário do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A>linha, essas configurações serão aplicadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> whose name is also the settings key.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> cujo nome também é a chave de configurações.

trans-unit.source: The sourceForm parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The sourceForm parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Saves settings for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> using the specified settings key.
trans-unit.target: Salva configurações especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> usando a chave de configurações especificadas.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls that are not on the form at design time when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> settings are saved are removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> when the settings are loaded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>controles que não estão no formulário no design de hora em que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>configurações são salvas são removidos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>quando as configurações são carregadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: To reset the settings, comment out the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A> line and leave the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.SaveSettings%2A> line.
trans-unit.target: Para redefinir as configurações, comente a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A>de linha e deixe o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.SaveSettings%2A>linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.SaveSettings%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A>

trans-unit.source: This will not load any settings and will persist the last state.
trans-unit.target: Isso não carregará as configurações e será mantido o último estado.

trans-unit.source: When you remove the comment from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A> line, those settings will be applied.
trans-unit.target: Quando você remover o comentário do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A>linha, essas configurações serão aplicadas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.LoadSettings%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> for which to save settings.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref> para o qual salvar as configurações.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing the settings key for this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que representa a chave de configurações para este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The key parameter is or empty.
trans-unit.target: O key parâmetro é ou vazio.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is rendered using visual style information called themes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> é renderizado usando as informações de estilo visual chamadas temas.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is rendered using themes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> renderizado usando temas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
